name: Visual C++ IntelliSense Database
summary: Learn about .NCB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NCB files are used by IntelliSense, a Visual Studio component that intelligently provides recommendations while developing source code (i.e., code autocompletion).

description: Symbols file used by Visual C++, a component of Microsoft's Visual Studio development software; contains information about different symbols used in a C++ software project, such as user-defined classes.
